summary: "The Strangers" is a scary movie about a couple whose vacation turns scary when three weirdos in masks break into their house. It's based on real-life crimes, like the Manson family murders. Shot in South Carolina, the film cost $9 million and became a surprise hit, making over $82 million. Critics didn't all love it, but many people enjoyed the suspense. It's now considered a cool, cult classic. There's even a sequel and more movies planned.
title: The Strangers (2008 film)
